item.name: The Shawshank Redemption
item.description: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.

item.name: The Godfather
item.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

item.name: The Dark Knight
item.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

item.name: The Godfather Part II
item.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

item.name: 12 Angry Men
item.description: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

item.name: Schindler's List
item.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

item.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
item.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

item.name: Pulp Fiction
item.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

item.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
item.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

item.name: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
item.alternateName: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
item.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

item.name: Forrest Gump
item.description: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

item.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
item.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

item.name: Fight Club
item.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

item.name: Inception
item.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

item.name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
item.description: After the Empire overpowers the Rebel Alliance, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda. At the same time, Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett pursue his friends across the galaxy.

item.name: The Matrix
item.description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

item.name: Goodfellas
item.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

item.name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
item.description: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

item.name: Interstellar
item.description: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

item.name: Se7en
item.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

item.name: It's a Wonderful Life
item.description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

item.name: Shichinin no samurai
item.description: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, who gathers six other samurai to join him.

item.name: The Silence of the Lambs
item.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

item.name: Saving Private Ryan
item.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

item.name: Cidade de Deus
item.description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

item.name: La vita è bella
item.description: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

item.name: The Green Mile
item.description: A tale set on death row, where gentle giant John Coffey possesses the mysterious power to heal people's ailments. When the lead guard, Paul Edgecombe, recognizes John's gift, he tries to help stave off the condemned man's execution.

item.name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
item.description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

item.name: Star Wars
item.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth ...

item.name: Back to the Future
item.description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

item.name: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
item.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

item.name: The Pianist
item.description: During WWII, acclaimed Polish musician Wladyslaw faces various struggles as he loses contact with his family. As the situation worsens, he hides in the ruins of Warsaw in order to survive.

item.name: Gisaengchung
item.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

item.name: Psycho
item.description: A secretary on the run for embezzlement takes refuge at a secluded California motel owned by a repressed man and his overbearing mother.

item.name: Gladiator
item.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

item.name: The Lion King
item.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

item.name: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
item.description: Miles Morales catapults across the multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a ...

item.name: The Departed
item.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

item.name: Whiplash
item.description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

item.name: American History X
item.description: Living a life marked by violence, neo-Nazi Derek finally goes to prison after killing two black youths. Upon his release, Derek vows to change; he hopes to prevent his brother, Danny, who idolizes Derek, from following in his foot...

item.name: Léon
item.description: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

item.name: Hotaru no haka
item.description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

item.name: The Prestige
item.description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

item.name: Seppuku
item.description: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

item.name: Dune: Part Two
item.description: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

item.name: The Usual Suspects
item.description: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

item.name: Casablanca
item.description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

item.name: Intouchables
item.description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

item.name: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
item.description: Salvatore, a famous film director, returns to his hometown for the funeral of the local theater's film projectionist, Alfredo. He reminisces about his life as a young boy falling in love with cinema.

item.name: Modern Times
item.description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

item.name: Alien
item.description: After investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin, the crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform.

item.name: Rear Window
item.description: A house and wheelchair-bound photographer, his fashion model girlfriend and his visiting Nurse spy on neighbors from his courtyard window. Despite skepticism by his PD Detective friend, they're convinced one of his neighbors is a ...

item.name: C'era una volta il West
item.alternateName: Once Upon a Time in the West
item.description: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

item.name: City Lights
item.description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

item.name: Django Unchained
item.description: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

item.name: Apocalypse Now
item.description: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

item.name: Memento
item.description: Leonard Shelby, an insurance investigator, suffers from anterograde amnesia and uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife, which is the last thing he remembers.

item.name: WALL·E
item.description: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

item.name: Raiders of the Lost Ark
item.description: In 1936, archaeologists and adventurers of the U.S. government hired Indiana Jones to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis could obtain its extraordinary powers.

item.name: 12th Fail
item.description: The real-life story of IPS Officer Manoj Kumar Sharma and IRS Officer Shraddha Joshi.

item.name: Das Leben der Anderen
item.description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

item.name: Sunset Blvd.
item.description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

item.name: Avengers: Infinity War
item.description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

item.name: Paths of Glory
item.description: After a failed attack on a German position, a general orders three soldiers, chosen at random, court-martialed for cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

item.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
item.description: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

item.name: Witness for the Prosecution
item.description: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

item.name: The Shining
item.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter, where a sinister presence influences the father into violence. At the same time, his psychic son sees horrifying forebodings from both the past and the future.

item.name: The Great Dictator
item.description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

item.name: Aliens
item.description: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

item.name: Inglourious Basterds
item.description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

item.name: The Dark Knight Rises
item.description: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.

item.name: Coco
item.description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

item.name: Amadeus
item.description: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

item.name: Toy Story
item.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

item.name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
item.description: An unhinged American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

item.name: Oldeuboi
item.description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must track down his captor in five days.

item.name: American Beauty
item.description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

item.name: Avengers: Endgame
item.description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

item.name: Das Boot
item.description: A German U-boat stalks the frigid waters of the North Atlantic as its young crew experience the sheer terror and claustrophobic life of a submariner in World War II.

item.name: Braveheart
item.description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

item.name: Good Will Hunting
item.description: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

item.name: Mononoke-hime
item.description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

item.name: Joker
item.description: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of crime and chaos in Gotham ...

item.name: Kimi no na wa.
item.description: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.

item.name: Tengoku to jigoku
item.description: An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.

item.name: 3 Idiots
item.description: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

item.name: Once Upon a Time in America
item.description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

item.name: Singin' in the Rain
item.description: A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

item.name: Capharnaüm
item.description: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

item.name: Idi i smotri
item.description: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

item.name: Requiem for a Dream
item.description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep..

item.name: Toy Story 3
item.description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

item.name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
item.description: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebel Alliance attempts to destroy the second Death Star while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

item.name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
item.description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories forever.

item.name: Jagten
item.description: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent li...

item.name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
item.description: After uncovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, a spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find its origins: a spacecraft manned by two men and the supercomputer HAL 9000.

item.name: Ikiru
item.description: A bureaucrat tries to find meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

item.name: Reservoir Dogs
item.description: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

item.name: Lawrence of Arabia
item.description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

item.name: The Apartment
item.description: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but office politics and his own romantic hopes complicate matters.

item.name: Incendies
item.description: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

item.name: Oppenheimer
item.description: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

item.name: North by Northwest
item.description: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

item.name: Scarface
item.description: Miami in the 1980s: a determined criminal minded Cuban immigrant, becomes the biggest drug smuggler in Florida, and is eventually undone by his own drug addiction.

item.name: Citizen Kane
item.description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

item.name: Double Indemnity
item.description: A Los Angeles insurance representative is seduced by an alluring housewife into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, a claims investigator.

item.name: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen Mörder
item.description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

item.name: Vertigo
item.description: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

item.name: Full Metal Jacket
item.description: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

item.name: Heat
item.description: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a verbal clue at their latest heist.

item.name: Le fabuleux destin d'Amélie Poulain
item.description: Despite being caught in her imaginative world, Amelie, a young waitress, decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey where she finds true love.

item.name: Up
item.description: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

item.name: A Clockwork Orange
item.description: Alex DeLarge and his droogs barbarize a decaying near-future.

item.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
item.description: Atticus Finch, a widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama, defends a Black man against an undeserved rape charge, and tries to educate his young children against prejudice.

item.name: Jodaeiye Nader az Simin
item.description: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

item.name: The Sting
item.description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

item.name: Die Hard
item.description: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

item.name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
item.description: In 1938, after his father goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against the Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

item.name: Taare Zameen Par
item.description: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

item.name: Metropolis
item.description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

item.name: Snatch
item.description: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

item.name: L.A. Confidential
item.description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

item.name: Ladri di biciclette
item.description: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen, endangering his efforts to find work. He and his son set out to find it.

item.name: Hamilton
item.description: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

item.name: Taxi Driver
item.description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

item.name: Der Untergang
item.description: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

item.name: Dangal
item.description: Mahavir Singh Phogat, a former wrestler, decides to fulfill his dream of winning a gold medal for his country by training his daughters for the Commonwealth Games despite the existing social stigmas.

item.name: Batman Begins
item.description: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

item.name: Per qualche dollaro in più
item.description: Two bounty killers with similar intentions but different motivations team up to track down a psychotic Mexican outlaw before he and his gang can carry out an audacious bank robbery.

item.name: The Wolf of Wall Street
item.description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

item.name: Green Book
item.description: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver for an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

item.name: Some Like It Hot
item.description: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

item.name: The Kid
item.description: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put their relationship in jeopardy.

item.name: Judgment at Nuremberg
item.description: Fictionalized depiction of the 1947 Judges' Trial, the third of twelve trials of Nazi war criminals conducted by the American occupying forces in Nuremberg, Germany, in which former judges of Nazi Germany were tried for their acti...

item.name: The Truman Show
item.description: An insurance salesman is oblivious of the fact that his entire life is a TV show and his family members are mere actors. As he starts noticing things and uncovers the truth, he decides to escape.

item.name: The Father
item.description: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages. As he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind and even the fabric of his reality.

item.name: All About Eve
item.description: Seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingenue Eve Harrington insinuates herself into the lives of aging Broadway star Margo Channing and her circle of theater friends in this Oscar-winning story.

item.name: Shutter Island
item.description: Teddy Daniels and Chuck Aule, two US marshals, are sent to an asylum on a remote island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient, where Teddy uncovers a shocking truth about the place.

item.name: There Will Be Blood
item.description: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

item.name: Top Gun: Maverick
item.description: The story involves Maverick confronting his past while training a group of younger Top Gun graduates, including the son of his deceased best friend, for a dangerous mission.

item.name: Jurassic Park
item.description: An industrialist invites some experts to visit his theme park of cloned dinosaurs. After a power failure, the creatures run loose, putting everyone's lives, including his grandchildren's, in danger.

item.name: Casino
item.description: In Las Vegas, two best friends - a casino executive and a mafia enforcer - compete for a gambling empire and a fast-living, fast-loving socialite.

item.name: Ran
item.description: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

item.name: The Sixth Sense
item.description: Malcolm Crowe, a child psychologist, starts treating a young boy, Cole, who encounters dead people and convinces him to help them. In turn, Cole helps Malcolm reconcile with his estranged wife.

item.name: El laberinto del fauno
item.description: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

item.name: Unforgiven
item.description: Retired Old West gunslinger Will Munny reluctantly takes on one last job to avenge an injustice with the help of his old partner and a newer outlaw known simply as The Schofield Kid.

item.name: No Country for Old Men
item.description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon the aftermath of a drug deal gone wrong and over two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

item.name: The Thing
item.description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

item.name: A Beautiful Mind
item.description: A mathematical genius, John Nash made an astonishing discovery early in his career and stood on the brink of international acclaim. But the handsome and arrogant Nash soon found himself on a harrowing journey of self-discovery.

item.name: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
item.description: After waking from a 4-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

item.name: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
item.description: Two down-on-their-luck Americans searching for work in 1920s Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

item.name: Yôjinbô
item.description: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

item.name: The Great Escape
item.description: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their men to escape from a German camp during World War II.

item.name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
item.description: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

item.name: Finding Nemo
item.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

item.name: Prisoners
item.description: Keller Dover is facing every parent's worst nightmare. His six-year-old daughter, Anna, is missing, together with her friend, Joy, and as minutes turn to hours, panic sets in. The only lead is an RV that had been parked on their s...

item.name: Hauru no ugoku shiro
item.description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

item.name: Rashômon
item.description: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

item.name: The Elephant Man
item.description: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

item.name: Dial M for Murder
item.description: A former tennis star arranges the murder of his adulterous wife.

item.name: Chinatown
item.description: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

item.name: Gone with the Wind
item.description: A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

item.name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
item.description: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

item.name: El secreto de sus ojos
item.description: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

item.name: Inside Out
item.description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

item.name: V for Vendetta
item.description: In a future British dystopian society, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow the tyrannical government - with the help of a young woman.

item.name: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
item.description: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

item.name: Raging Bull
item.description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

item.name: Trainspotting
item.description: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out despite the allure of drugs and the influence of friends.

item.name: The Bridge on the River Kwai
item.description: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.

item.name: Klaus
item.description: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

item.name: Catch Me If You Can
item.description: Barely 17 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

item.name: Fargo
item.description: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

item.name: Warrior
item.description: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

item.name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
item.description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.

item.name: Gran Torino
item.description: After a Hmong teenager tries to steal his prized 1972 Gran Torino, a disgruntled, prejudiced Korean War veteran seeks to redeem both the boy and himself.

item.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 2
item.alternateName: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
item.description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

item.name: Million Dollar Baby
item.description: Frankie, an ill-tempered old coach, reluctantly agrees to train aspiring boxer Maggie. Impressed with her determination and talent, he helps her become the best and the two soon form a close bond.

item.name: Tonari no Totoro
item.description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

item.name: Mad Max: Fury Road
item.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper and a drifter named Max.

item.name: Bacheha-Ye aseman
item.description: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

item.name: Ben-Hur
item.description: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend in 1st-century Jerusalem, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

item.name: 12 Years a Slave
item.description: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

item.name: Before Sunrise
item.description: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

item.name: Blade Runner
item.description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

item.name: Barry Lyndon
item.description: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

item.name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
item.description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

item.name: Hacksaw Ridge
item.description: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, serving during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

item.name: Gone Girl
item.description: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

item.name: Maharaja
item.description: A barber seeks vengeance after his home is burglarized, cryptically telling police his "lakshmi" has been taken, leaving them uncertain if it's a person or object. His quest to recover the elusive "lakshmi" unfolds.

item.name: Dead Poets Society
item.description: Maverick teacher John Keating returns in 1959 to the prestigious New England boys' boarding school where he was once a star student, using poetry to embolden his pupils to new heights of self-expression.

item.name: Salinui chueok
item.alternateName: ฆาตกรรม ความตาย และสายฝน
item.description: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

item.name: In the Name of the Father
item.description: An Irish man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. Meanwhile, a British lawyer fights to clear their names and free them.

item.name: The Gold Rush
item.description: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

item.name: Monsters, Inc.
item.description: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

item.name: Relatos salvajes
item.description: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

item.name: The Deer Hunter
item.description: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

item.name: The General
item.description: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through ene...

item.name: Sherlock Jr.
item.description: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

item.name: Jaws
item.description: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Cape Cod, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

item.name: How to Train Your Dragon
item.description: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

item.name: Ratatouille
item.description: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

item.name: On the Waterfront
item.description: An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.

item.name: Mary and Max.
item.description: In 1976 Melbourne, a lonely 8-year-old girl strikes up a correspondence with an unlikely pen pal: a severely obese 44-year-old New Yorker with Asperger's syndrome.

item.name: Le salaire de la peur
item.description: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

item.name: Smultronstället
item.description: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

item.name: The Third Man
item.description: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

item.name: Ford v Ferrari
item.description: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

item.name: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
item.description: A naive youth leader is appointed to fill a vacancy in the U.S. Senate. His idealistic plans promptly collide with corruption at home and subterfuge from his hero in Washington, but he tries to forge ahead despite attacks on his c...

item.name: Tôkyô monogatari
item.description: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

item.name: Logan
item.description: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

item.name: Rocky
item.description: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

item.name: The Big Lebowski
item.description: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

item.name: Det sjunde inseglet
item.description: A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

item.name: Room
item.description: A little boy is held captive in a room with his mother since his birth, so he has never known the world outside.

item.name: Spotlight
item.description: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

item.name: The Terminator
item.description: The Terminator, a cyborg assassin from the future, attempts to find and kill Sarah Connor, a waitress who is destined to give birth to a man who will save humankind from extinction.

item.name: Hotel Rwanda
item.description: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

item.name: Platoon
item.description: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

item.name: La haine
item.description: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

item.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
item.description: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save Elizabeth Swann, the governor's daughter and his love, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

item.name: Before Sunset
item.description: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

item.name: La passion de Jeanne d'Arc
item.description: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

item.name: Jai Bhim
item.description: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

item.name: The Best Years of Our Lives
item.description: Three World War II veterans, two of them traumatized or disabled, return home to the American midwest to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

item.name: The Exorcist
item.description: When a mysterious entity possesses a young girl, her mother seeks the help of two Catholic priests to save her life.

item.name: Rush
item.description: James Hunt and Niki Lauda, two extremely skilled Formula One racers, have an intense rivalry with each other. However, it is their enmity that pushes them to their limits.

item.name: The Incredibles
item.description: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.

item.name: Network
item.description: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit, but finds that his message may be difficult to control.

item.name: The Wizard of Oz
item.description: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others...

item.name: Stand by Me
item.description: A writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

item.name: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
item.description: Professor Wilson discovers a lost Akita puppy on his way home. Despite objections from his wife, Hachi endears himself to the family and grows to be Parker's loyal companion. As their bond grows deeper, a beautiful relationship un...

item.name: The Sound of Music
item.description: A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

item.name: Babam ve Oglum
item.description: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

item.name: Ah-ga-ssi
item.description: In 1930s Korea, a girl is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress who lives a secluded life on a countryside estate. But the maid has a secret: She is a pickpocket recruited by a swindler to help seduce the Lady and steal her ...

item.name: To Be or Not to Be
item.description: During the German occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

item.name: Into the Wild
item.description: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness.

item.name: La battaglia di Algeri
item.description: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

item.name: The Grapes of Wrath
item.description: An Oklahoma family, driven off their farm by the poverty and hopelessness of the Dust Bowl, joins the westward migration to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

item.name: Groundhog Day
item.description: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day.

item.name: The Iron Giant
item.description: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

item.name: Amores perros
item.description: An amateur dog fighter, a supermodel, and a derelict assassin, all separately struggling to find love, find their lives transformed by a devastating car wreck in Mexico City.

item.name: Rebecca
item.description: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

item.name: The Help
item.description: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily b...

item.name: Cool Hand Luke
item.description: A laid-back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

item.name: It Happened One Night
item.description: A rogue reporter trailing a runaway heiress for a big story joins her on a bus heading from Florida to New York and they end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves them behind at one of the stops along the way.

item.name: Paris, Texas
item.description: Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.

item.name: Aladdin
item.description: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

item.name: Gangs of Wasseypur
item.description: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

name: IMDb Top 250 Movies
description: As rated by regular IMDb voters.
